EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-08-Activate Your Cloud Sweepstakes Reinvent.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: October Prize Unlocked! Enter to win a full conference pass to AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-burst-sweepstakes-aws/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudburst-aws&utm_content=08142017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We told you there would be more chances to win. The Cloud Burst Sweepstakes Series October prize is an AWS re:Invent® full conference pass! The drawing to win the event pass will be held on October 13, 2017. Don’t miss your chance to enter and win access to one of the hottest events of the year. The Cloud Burst Sweepstakes offers a different prize every month this fall. For the month of October, we are offering an AWS re:Invent full conference pass. Head out to Las Vegas for five days of innovative breakout sessions, multiple hackathons, and hundreds of ways to get hands-on experience with AWS experts. Enter now for a chance to win October’s prize and unlock access to our grand prize drawing in November! <[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-burst-sweepstakes-aws/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudburst-aws&utm_content=08142017]]>
September 1: Microsoft Ignite® Full Conference Pass (Sept. 25 - 29, 2017) October 13: AWS re:Invent® Full Conference Pass (Nov. 27 - Dec. 1, 2017) November 3: LOCKED
-The Turbonomic Team
